2033897742.description: Currency used to purchase Legendary weapons and armor in the Tower.
2033897742.name: weekly_pve
2033897742.source: Vanguard Marks are earned most quickly by playing in Strike Playlists.  You can earn up to 100 Vanguard Marks per week.

2033897755.description: Currency used to purchase Legendary weapons and armor in the Tower.
2033897755.name: weekly_pvp
2033897755.source: Crucible Marks are earned most quickly by competing in the Crucible against other Guardians.  You can earn up to 100 Crucible Marks per week.
